content:
Prev: Facade Up: Gothic Quarter Next: Market interior

Mercat St. Josep



Inside was a large farmer's market, with stalls of vegetables, fruit, meat, or any other sort of food you might want.
I was tempted by the fresh lychees but we only ended up getting some candy to bring back to the kids.
Taken Monday, September 10, 2001, 10:31:12am.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 953kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/30s @ F6.3, ISO 100, 78mm
PS6 Curves 0:0 - 15:35 - 35:60 - 245:240 - 255:255, USM 50:100 - 50:20 - 30:4 - 150:0.5
